title: Students Who Failed
description: Write a query to find students who scored below 75 in any course. Display student_name, course_name, and grade, ordered by grade ascending.
hint: Join students, enrollments, and courses. Use WHERE to filter grades below 75.
solution: SELECT students.name as student_name, courses.course_name, enrollments.grade FROM students INNER JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id INNER JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE enrollments.grade < 75 ORDER BY enrollments.grade ASC
